trans-unit.source: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in s step will be displayed to your app's customers.
trans-unit.target: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in s step will be displayed to your app's customers.

trans-unit.source: Create IAP descriptions
trans-unit.target: Create IAP descriptions

trans-unit.source: Create IAP descriptions
trans-unit.target: Create IAP descriptions

trans-unit.source: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in **Descriptions** step will be displayed to your app's customers.
trans-unit.target: When submitting an IAP, the info you enter in **Descriptions** step will be displayed to your app's customers.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to consider the description carefully in order to represent your IAP accurately in a way that makes it appealing to customers.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to consider the description carefully in order to represent your IAP accurately in a way that makes it appealing to customers.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the description for each language in which you offer your app.
trans-unit.target: You can customize the description for each language in which you offer your app.

trans-unit.source: Languages
trans-unit.target: Languages

trans-unit.source: Before you can enter description info, you need to specify one or more [languages](supported-languages.md).
trans-unit.target: Before you can enter description info, you need to specify one or more [languages](supported-languages.md).

trans-unit.source: We recommend providing descriptions for every language your app supports.
trans-unit.target: We recommend providing descriptions for every language your app supports.

trans-unit.source: Under the **Descriptions** section of your IAP’s submission, click **Add languages**.
trans-unit.target: Under the **Descriptions** section of your IAP’s submission, click **Add languages**.

trans-unit.source: Choose one or more languages from the list and then click Save at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Choose one or more languages from the list and then click Save at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: You’ll then see these languages listed in the **Add languages** section.
trans-unit.target: You’ll then see these languages listed in the **Add languages** section.

trans-unit.source: Click the language name to provide description info for that language.
trans-unit.target: Click the language name to provide description info for that language.

trans-unit.source: You can add additional languages later by clicking **Add languages** again.
trans-unit.target: You can add additional languages later by clicking **Add languages** again.

trans-unit.source: Title
trans-unit.target: Title

trans-unit.source: This is the name your customers will see for this IAP.
trans-unit.target: This is the name your customers will see for this IAP.

trans-unit.source: Enter a name of up to 100 characters.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name of up to 100 characters.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to display more info than just a title, you can enter up to 200 characters here.
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to display more info than just a title, you can enter up to 200 characters here.

trans-unit.source: This field is optional.
trans-unit.target: This field is optional.

trans-unit.source: Icon
trans-unit.target: Icon

trans-unit.source: You also have the option to provide an image that may be displayed when the user buys the product.
trans-unit.target: You also have the option to provide an image that may be displayed when the user buys the product.

trans-unit.source: This icon must be a .png file that measures exactly 300 x 300 pixels.
trans-unit.target: This icon must be a .png file that measures exactly 300 x 300 pixels.
